ygData.subject: RE: level hell
ygData.msgSnippet: ... Depends on the piece.  The bracers I know net about 5pp (105pp for the sapphire, 110 to sell).  But the boots are a net loss (210pp for 2 sapphires, 158pp
ygData.messageBody:
On Wed, 8 Sep 1999, James Schuldes wrote:
>
> My fiends who recently went thru level 30 hell found that doing the quests
> for crafted armor (go talk to the named Centaurs in South Karana) visibly
> moved their xp bub's and helped get them thru hell a.s.a.p. which was still
> kinda slow but they made it. And ya, crafted is War only but you can sell
> the stuff to a merch if you cant find a player who will buy and still profit
> - both pp and xp.

Depends on the piece. The bracers I know net about 5pp (105pp
for the sapphire, 110 to sell). But the boots are a net loss
(210pp for 2 sapphires, 158pp to sell).

--
John H. Kim
kim@...
